","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59ta","text":"Incise lower abdomen, midline, to expose dome","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pg10","text":"Place UroMOCA roots","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h5ep","text":"Place EMG electrode pairs in pelvic floor musculature and lower back
